top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

It’s you’re. 

Pretty sure it’s your arrogance that your employer and coworkers don’t appreciate.

Tip number one:  never be late for work

Tip number two: get along with coworkers

Tip number three: dress smartly and be clean

Tip number four: try to never miss a shift

Tip number five: be reliable and responsive

Do those things and you’ll succeed even if you’re not actually that good at your job!

Edit: spelling correction -hey there’s another tip!
LPT if you’re gonna bitch about who’s bright and who’s not, at least use proper grammar, dipshit.
I’m not the brightest, but I am certainly the laziest
